channel.description:
[b]INGLORIOUS WOLVES[/b]
semi-VANILLA PVP SURVIVAL FACTIONS ADVENTURE MAP
We are a semi-vanilla server with the right plugins. [img][/img]Our goal is to offer the perfect survival experience to our players. Mature community and harcore pvp, we do not support creative and eveything is build LEGIT.
JOIN US at: mc.ingloriouswolves.com:25624
